SELECT
a.txGroupImages, a.pgGroupImages, b.txLibrary, a.txName, a.urlRedirect FROM ${database.schema}site_images a, ${database.schema}group_images b where a.txGroupImages = b.txGroupImages;

SELECT
a.txGroupImages, a.pgGroupImages, b.txLibrary, a.txName, a.urlRedirect FROM ${database.schema}site_images a, ${database.schema}group_images b where a.txGroupImages = #{string} and a.txGroupImages = b.txGroupImages;

SELECT
tab1.txGroupImages, tab1.pgGroupImages, tab1.txLibrary, tab1.txName, tab1.urlRedirect, c.txGender FROM
(
SELECT
a.txGroupImages, a.pgGroupImages, b.txLibrary, a.txName, a.urlRedirect
FROM ${database.schema}site_images a, ${database.schema}group_images b where a.txGroupImages = b.txGroupImages and a.txGroupImages = #{txGroupImages} ) tab1 left join ${database.schema}gender c
on tab1.pgGroupImages = c.idGender and c.idLanguages = 'it'
;
